H0.text: Light is the form of energy found in firewood.

H1.text: Sound is the form of energy present in firewood.

H2.text: Kinetic energy is the form of energy found in firewood.

H3.text: Potential energy is the form of energy found in firewood.

A4.text: When a fuel is burned, the chemical energy of molecular oxygen and the fuel is converted to heat.

A5.text: Chemical potential energy is a form of potential energy related to the structural arrangement of atoms or molecules.
